root.name: list()

js_mode.description:
Use a "@pjs font" directive to preload font files before your sketch starts: /* @pjs font="Arial.ttf"; */
Please see this page for details on font handling in JavaScript mode: http://wiki.processing.org/w/Font_handling_in_JavaScript_mode

root.description: Gets a list of the fonts installed on the system. The data is returned as a String array. This list provides the names of each font for input into createFont(), which allows Processing to dynamically format fonts.
